meanings.definition: A person or thing that surprises.
meanings.sent1: The magician was the surprisers at the party, making everyone gasp in amazement.
meanings.sent2: The surprisers at the event were the unexpected fireworks display.
meanings.sent3: The puppy was the surprisers when it learned to do a backflip!
meanings.sent4: Her sudden resignation was a surprisers to the entire team.
meanings.sent5: The surprisers of the treasure hunt was the hidden room behind the bookshelf.

meanings.definition: Those who cause surprise or astonishment.
meanings.sent1: The pranksters were the surprisers behind the hilarious practical jokes.
meanings.sent2: The surprisers of the talent show were the young musicians with their extraordinary performance.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous raccoon was the surprisers as it stole cookies from the picnic.
meanings.sent4: The surprisers of the fashion show were the models in avant-garde outfits.
meanings.sent5: The unexpected plot twist in the movie was the ultimate surprisers for the audience.
